  1. 21/365: Andy, surprised

    25.01.2011

    Andy suggested I take a photo of him in case I wasn't able to get another one that day. Not long after I took this my battery died so I guess I'm stuck with it.

  3. 19/365: Flowers

    Bought some flowers for Steph. Yeah, that's right, you wish you were married to me.

  4. 18/365: "I wanna be able to see my face in it"

    22.01.2011

    This is the first daily photo taken with my new DSLR. I'd originally bought a second-hand Nikon D70s, but when it arrived broken and completely unusable I decided to return that and go for a brand new D3100. In short, it's ace, although I haven't worked out how to get the best out of it yet. For now at least, hopefully these photos will be slightly better quality.

    By the way, if anyone wants to buy me a new lens or two I'll be your friend forever. Or a new bag. Anything, I'm not fussy.
